reading: 誰かに書いてもらうにしろ、内容は我々が考えなければならない。
english: Even if we ask someone to write it for us, we will have to think of what to say (literally: the content) ourselves.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: どのソフトを使うにしろ、早く使い方に慣れてもらわないといけない。
reading: どのソフトを使うにしろ、早く使い方に慣れてもらわないといけない。
english: Whichever software application you use, you must quickly get comfortable using it (literally: get used to how to use it).

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: 誰がそれを説明するにせよ、相手の気持ちを傷つけないように細心の注意が必要だ。
reading: 誰がそれを説明するにせよ、相手の気持ちを傷つけないように細心の注意が必要だ。
english: Whoever explains it (to him) must be very careful not to hurt his feelings.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: どんな事情があったにせよ、何も言わずに仕事を辞めるのは無責任すぎる。
reading: どんな事情があったにせよ、何も言わずに仕事を辞めるのは無責任すぎる。
english: No matter what the circumstances were, quitting the job without saying anything is just (too) irresponsible.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: ホームページの制作に関する書籍は書店の棚にあふれている状態で、自分が読むにせよ、他人に勧めるにせよ、大いに迷う。
reading: ホームページの制作に関する書籍は書店の棚にあふれている状態で、自分が読むにせよ、他人に勧めるにせよ、大いに迷う。
english: Books on Web page design are spilling off of bookstore shelves, and whether we want to read them ourselves or recommend them to someone else, it is hard to know what to choose.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: 現政権を支持するにせよ批判するにせよ、まずはじめに問題に対する正確な理解と冷静な分析が不可欠である。
reading: 現政権を支持するにせよ批判するにせよ、まずはじめに問題に対する正確な理解と冷静な分析が不可欠である。
english: First of all, whether you support the current administration or criticize it, an accurate understanding and a cool analysis of the problems are indispensable.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: 野球にせよサッカーにせよ、プロでやっていくには並の努力では続かない。
reading: 野球にせよサッカーにせよ、プロでやっていくには並の努力では続かない。
english: Whether it be baseball or soccer, you cannot stay as a professional player just with an ordinary effort.
extra_notes: 並 = average

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: 普通の人は、意識的にせよ無意識的にせよ、不快なことを避けようとする。
reading: 普通の人は、意識的にせよ無意識的にせよ、不快なことを避けようとする。
english: Whether they do it consciously or unconsciously, ordinary people try to avoid unpleasant things.

translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.
japanese: 一旦ネットに発信してしまった情報は、それが真実にせよそうでないにせよ、取り消しができない。
reading: 一旦ネットに発信してしまった情報は、それが真実にせよそうでないにせよ、取り消しができない。
english: Whether it is true or not, once you send out information on the Internet, you can't take it back.

translation: Also; (even) for ~
explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.
japanese: 彼は日本語を20年も勉強しているが、その彼にしたところで、まだ分からない文法に時々出くわすそうだ。
reading: 彼は日本語を20年も勉強しているが、その彼にしたところで、まだ分からない文法に時々出くわすそうだ。
english: He has studied Japanese for 20 years, but he told me that even he still encounters grammar he doesn't understand.

translation: Also; (even) for ~
explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.
japanese: 子供はいつか手の届かないところへ行ってしまうものだ。自分の子だけはそうでないと思うかもしれないが、あなたの子にしたところで同じだ。
reading: 子供はいつか手の届かないところへ行ってしまうものだ。自分の子だけはそうでないと思うかもしれないが、あなたの子にしたところで同じだ。
english: Children go (places) beyond their parents' reach sooner or later. You may think that your own children will be different, but they, too, will be the same.

translation: Also; (even) for ~
explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.
japanese: 昔の浮気が発覚した夫は「10年たってるんだからもう時効だ」と開き直りの態度です。私にしたところで二人の子供のことを考えると離婚にはなかなか踏み切れません。
reading: 昔の浮気が発覚した夫は「10年たってるんだからもう時効だ」と開き直りの態度です。私にしたところで二人の子供のことを考えると離婚にはなかなか踏み切れません。
english: My husband, whose past affair was discovered, turned deﬁant, saying, "It was 10 years ago, so it's too late (to do anything)" I, too, couldn't bear to go forward with a divorce when I thought about our two children.

translation: Also; (even) for ~
explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.
japanese: 最近は万年筆で字を書く人というのを、ほとんど見なくなって残念だ。もっとも、そういう私にしたところで、普段使っているのはボールペンだ。
reading: 最近は万年筆で字を書く人というのを、ほとんど見なくなって残念だ。もっとも、そういう私にしたところで、普段使っているのはボールペンだ。
english: Lately, you seldom see people writing with a fountain pen, and that makes me feel terribly disappointed. But even I usually use a ball-point pen.

translation: Also; (even) for ~
explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.
japanese: 三島由紀夫は産湯に浸かった記憶があると書いているが、彼にしたところで、死ぬまでのすべての記憶があるわけではない。
reading: 三島[みしま] 由紀夫[ゆきお]は産湯に浸かった記憶があると書いているが、彼にしたところで、死ぬまでのすべての記憶があるわけではない。
english: Yukio Mishima wrote that he remembered (literally: had a memory of) taking his ﬁrst bath as a baby, but there's no way even he remembered everything he did from birth until death (literally: until he died).

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 過度の恐怖や心労が一夜にして白髪をつくる。
reading: 過度の恐怖や心労が一夜にして白髪をつくる。
english: Excessive fear and worry will make your hair turn grey overnight.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 彼女は45歳にして初めて子供ができた。
reading: 彼女は45歳にして初めて子供ができた。
english: She had her ﬁrst child at the age of 45.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 外国に居ながらにして日本からの生のテレビ放送が見られるようになった。
reading: 外国に居ながらにして日本からの生のテレビ放送が見られるようになった。
english: We can now watch live TV broadcasts from Japan while in a foreign country.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 空襲で東京の町は一夜にして焼け野原になってしまった。
reading: 空襲で東京の町は一夜にして焼け野原になってしまった。
english: An air raid turned the city of Tokyo into a burnt ﬁeld overnight.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: この本は発売1週間にして売れ行きが目に見えて落ち込み始めた。
reading: この本は発売1週間にして売れ行きが目に見えて落ち込み始めた。
english: The sales of this book began to decline visibly a week after it went on sale.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 美男美女のカップルの子にふさわしく、その女の子は生後1か月にして目鼻立ちがはっきりしていた。
reading: 美男美女のカップルの子にふさわしく、その女の子は生後1か月にして目鼻立ちがはっきりしていた。
english: As expected of a child born of a handsome couple, the baby girl developed striking features one month after her birth.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: ケプラーは若年にして地位と収入の安定を獲得し、生涯天文学の研究に打ち込む機会をも与えられたのだった。
reading: ケプラーは若年にして地位と収入の安定を獲得し、生涯天文学の研究に打ち込む機会をも与えられたのだった。
english: Kepler obtained a secure position and income at a young age, and was given the opportunity to devote his entire life to astronomy research.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 彼はなんと気の早いことに、高校１年にして大学受験日記をつけ始めた。
reading: 彼はなんと気の早いことに、高校１年にして大学受験日記をつけ始めた。
english: He's in such a hurry! He started to keep a journal for college entrance examinations while still a freshman in high school.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 今年受験2回目にして日本語能力試験1級に合格した。
reading: 今年受験2回目にして日本語能力試験1級に合格した。
english: This year, on my second try, I passed Level 1 of the Japanese Language Proficiency Test.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 今にして思えば懐かしいが、若い頃は小さなことでもくよくよ悩んでいたねえ。
reading: 今にして思えば懐かしいが、若い頃は小さなことでもくよくよ悩んでいたねえ。
english: When I think about it now it makes me smile, but when I was young I worried about every little thing under the sun.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 人間は生まれながらにして健康に生きていこうとする力を持っているそうだ。
reading: 人間は生まれながらにして健康に生きていこうとする力を持っているそうだ。
english: I have heard that people are born with the ability to live in good health.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: ローマは一日にして成らず。
reading: ローマは一日にして成らず。
english: Rome was not built in a day.

explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.
japanese: 四十にして惑わず。五十にして天命を知る。（『論語』）
reading: 四十にして惑わず。五十にして天命を知る。（『論語』）
english: At the age of 40 one doesn't doubt, and at 50 one knows heaven's will. (The Analects of Confucius)

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 彼女は頭脳明晰にして端麗な秘書である。
reading: 彼女は頭脳明晰にして端麗な秘書である。
english: She is a bright and also beautiful secretary.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 彼は偉大な学者にして優れた教育者でもあった。
reading: 彼は偉大な学者にして優れた教育者でもあった。
english: He was both a distinguished scholar and an excellent educator.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: あの男の性格は粗野にして猛々しい。
reading: あの男の性格は粗野にして猛々しい。
english: (The character of) That man is boorish and ﬁerce.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 首相の容体は不安定にして、予断を許さない。
reading: 首相の容体は不安定にして、予断を許さない。
english: The Prime Minister's condition is unstable and unpredictable.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: その政治家は志操堅固にして、高潔清廉な人だった。
reading: その政治家は志操堅固にして、高潔清廉な人だった。
english: The politician was a man of principle, purity and nobility.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: これほど巧妙にして完璧な犯罪はないでしょう。
reading: これほど巧妙にして完璧な犯罪はないでしょう。
english: No crime could be as ingenious and perfect as this one.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 彼女の絵は緻密にして軽やかな筆づかいで圧倒的な支持を集めた。
reading: 彼女の絵は緻密にして軽やかな筆づかいで圧倒的な支持を集めた。
english: Her paintings have become phenomenally popular (literally: gathered overwhelming support) for their elaborate and light-hearted brush strokes.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: あの文法辞典は詳細にして明解な説明が施されている。
reading: あの文法辞典は詳細にして明解な説明が施されている。
english: That grammar dictionary has clear, detailed explanations.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: これは堅牢にして素朴な民芸品であります。
reading: これは堅牢にして素朴な民芸品であります。
english: This is a solid and simple (example of) folk art.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: この監督の映画はすべて陰鬱にして物悲しい。
reading: この監督の映画はすべて陰鬱にして物悲しい。
english: All of this director's ﬁlms are gloomy and sad.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: あの政治家の言動は非常識にして、絶えず批判されている。
reading: あの政治家の言動は非常識にして、絶えず批判されている。
english: The way that politician speaks and acts deﬁes common sense, and he is criticized endlessly.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 栄太は内心頑固にして決して人に使われる男ではない。
reading: 栄太[えいた]は内心頑固にして決して人に使われる男ではない。
english: Eita is (a man who is) stubborn of spirit, and is never taken advantage of by others.

explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.
japanese: 彼は優秀な研究者にして熱烈な教育者でもある。
reading: 彼は優秀な研究者にして熱烈な教育者でもある。
english: He is a superb researcher and a fervent educator.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: ワールドカップの時はサッカーファンでもない私にしてからが興奮状態でした。
reading: ワールドカップの時はサッカーファンでもない私にしてからが興奮状態でした。
english: I am not a soccer fan, but during the World Cup, even I got excited.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: 警察にしてからが、いざ事件が起きないと市民を暴力から守ってくれない。
reading: 警察にしてからが、いざ事件が起きないと市民を暴力から守ってくれない。
english: Even the police don't protect citizens from violence unless an incident actually occurs.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: ギリシャやローマの彫刻や壁画などに、痩せた女性は皆無だ。美の女神、ヴィーナスにしてからが、かなり太めだ。
reading: ギリシャやローマの彫刻や壁画などに、痩せた女性は皆無だ。美の女神、ヴィーナスにしてからが、かなり太めだ。
english: In Greek or Roman sculptures and mural paintings there are no emaciated-looking women. Even Venus, the Goddess of Beauty, is quite full-ﬁgured.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: 当代随一の知性人である彼にしてからが、恋愛にたぶらかされている。
reading: 当代随一の知性人である彼にしてからが、恋愛にたぶらかされている。
english: Even he, the greatest intellectual of the day, was deceived by love.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: 息子は父から受け継いだ作風で作品を描いていたが、すでにその父にしてからが、古くさいと言われていた。
reading: 息子は父から受け継いだ作風で作品を描いていたが、すでにその父にしてからが、古くさいと言われていた。
english: He produced paintings in the mode he inherited from his father, but that style was already considered outdated in his father's time.

translation: even
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.
japanese: 首相の構造改革案にしてからが、官僚の強い抵抗にあっている。
reading: 首相の構造改革案にしてからが、官僚の強い抵抗にあっている。
english: Even the prime minister's plan for structural reform met with strong resistance from bureaucrats.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: ピアノを買うにしても、こんな狭いアパートでは置くところがない。
reading: ピアノを買うにしても、こんな狭いアパートでは置くところがない。
english: Even if we decide to buy a piano, we won't have a place to put it in such a small apartment.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 美紀の言ったことは大げさだったにしても、すべてがウソというわけではないだろう。
reading: 美紀[みき]の言ったことは大げさだったにしても、すべてがウソというわけではないだろう。
english: Even though (we agree that) Miki's story was exaggerated, probably not all of it was untrue.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 誰がこの仕事をやるにしても失敗は許されない。
reading: 誰がこの仕事をやるにしても失敗は許されない。
english: No matter who is going to do this job, we have no room for mistakes.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 君が行くにしても他の誰かが行くにしても今回の会議はかなりの準備が必要だ。
reading: 君が行くにしても他の誰かが行くにしても今回の会議はかなりの準備が必要だ。
english: Whether you go or someone else does, this meeting will take a lot of preparation.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 敬語の使い方にしても近頃は間違った言い方が目につく。
reading: 敬語の使い方にしても近頃は間違った言い方が目につく。
english: With honorific language, too, we often notice incorrect usage these days.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 今すぐ帰るにしても、飛行機の切符が取れるだろうか。
reading: 今すぐ帰るにしても、飛行機の切符が取れるだろうか。
english: Even if we (decide to) go home right now, I wonder if we will be able to get plane tickets.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 京都は見るところがたくさんあるので、市内だけ回るにしても3日くらいとっておいた方がいいでしょう。
reading: 京都は見るところがたくさんあるので、市内だけ回るにしても3日くらいとっておいた方がいいでしょう。
english: Kyoto has so many places to see, so even if you (decide to) stay within the city, you should plan on spending about three days.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: この作品は中国大陸の影響が濃厚であるにしても、日本の画工の高い水準を示している。
reading: この作品は中国大陸の影響が濃厚であるにしても、日本の画工の高い水準を示している。
english: Even taking the strong inﬂuence from China into account, this work demonstrates the high quality craftsmanship of Japanese painters.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 今度の台風では最悪の事態は避けられたにしても、被害は甚大だ。
reading: 今度の台風では最悪の事態は避けられたにしても、被害は甚大だ。
english: Even though (it is true that) we could avoid a worst-case scenario, the damage from this typhoon is (still) enormous.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: ニューヨークほどではないにしても、この市でもかなり質の高い音楽が聴けます。
reading: ニューヨークほどではないにしても、この市でもかなり質の高い音楽が聴けます。
english: Even though it's not what you get in New York, you can listen to fairly high-quality music in this city, too.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 何をするにしても英語はしっかり勉強しておいた方がいい。
reading: 何をするにしても英語はしっかり勉強しておいた方がいい。
english: Whatever you may do (in the future), you'd do well to study English hard.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 行くにしてもやめるにしても早く決めてもらえませんか。
reading: 行くにしてもやめるにしても早く決めてもらえませんか。
english: Whether you decide to go or not, could you make up your mind soon?

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 達也にしても悪気があってあんなことを言ったわけじゃない。
reading: 達也にしても悪気があってあんなことを言ったわけじゃない。
english: When he said that, Tatsuya didn't intend to be mean-spirited, either.

translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.
japanese: 輸入キャンピングカー車内器具はほとんどが１２０Vの規格で作られているので、１００V電源の日本のキャンプ場ではレンジにしてもエアコンにしても、今一つ出力が弱い。
reading: 輸入キャンピングカー車内器具はほとんどが１２０Vの規格で作られているので、１００V電源の日本のキャンプ場ではレンジにしてもエアコンにしても、今一つ出力が弱い。
english: Because most of the appliances in imported campers are designed for the 120-volt standard, stoves and air-conditioners, for example, do not have enough output at campsites in Japan, where 100 volts is the standard.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 彼の研究範囲は哲学(だけ)にとどまらず、認知心理学の領域にまで広がっている。
reading: 彼の研究範囲は哲学(だけ)にとどまらず、認知心理学の領域にまで広がっている。
english: His area of research is not limited merely to philosophy, but extends to cognitive psychology as well.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 彼女は小説を広く読む(だけ)にとどまらず、自分でもいくつか書いて、すでに雑誌に発表している。
reading: 彼女は小説を広く読む(だけ)にとどまらず、自分でもいくつか書いて、すでに雑誌に発表している。
english: Not only does she avidly read novels, she also has written a couple of novels herself, which have been published in magazines.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 博士は専門の数学にとどまらず、コンピュータサイエンスでも優れた研究をしている。
reading: 博士は専門の数学にとどまらず、コンピュータサイエンスでも優れた研究をしている。
english: The doctor is doing excellent research not only in his speciality, mathematics, but also in computer science.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 本研究室での研究は、単なる理論にとどまらず、その応用も重視している。
reading: 本研究室での研究は、単なる理論にとどまらず、その応用も重視している。
english: At our lab, we don't just focus on theory, we also emphasize its application.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 先輩方には単に学生時代にとどまらず、卒業後も人生のよき先輩として貴重なアドバイスをいただいてまいりました。
reading: 先輩方には単に学生時代にとどまらず、卒業後も人生のよき先輩として貴重なアドバイスをいただいてまいりました。
english: My senior schoolmates, as people more experienced in life, have given me invaluable advice, not only when I was a student but also after I graduated.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 本医学部は医学の専門知識だけにとどまらず、人間愛、使命感、責任感、といった人間教育にも力を注いでいます。
reading: 本医学部は医学の専門知識だけにとどまらず、人間愛、使命感、責任感、といった人間教育にも力を注いでいます。
english: This medical school not only teaches technical expertise, it also makes an effort to teach ethics (literally: human education), such as respect (literally: love) for human beings, a sense of mission and a sense of responsibility.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 室内楽では一人一人の奏者が自分のパートを理解するだけにとどまらず、他のすべてのパートも理解しなければならない。
reading: 室内楽では一人一人の奏者が自分のパートを理解するだけにとどまらず、他のすべてのパートも理解しなければならない。
english: In chamber music, each player has to understand not only his or her own part, but everyone else's as well.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: この薬は髪が薄くなるのを防ぐだけにとどまらず、白髪を黒い髪に戻します。
reading: この薬は髪が薄くなるのを防ぐだけにとどまらず、白髪を黒い髪に戻します。
english: Not only does this medicine prevent your hair from thinning, it brings your grey hair back to its original black colour.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 本学の博士号は専門的知識における卓越性を証明するものであるにとどまらず、取得者が人間的力量の持ち主であることを宣言するものです。
reading: 本学の博士号は専門的知識における卓越性を証明するものであるにとどまらず、取得者が人間的力量の持ち主であることを宣言するものです。
english: A doctorate from this university not only serves as evidence of excellence in professional knowledge, it also declares that the holder possesses great potential as a person.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 力学という学問は、物質世界を統制する科学技術の体系として重要であるにとどまらず、世界を認識するための体系として重要である。
reading: 力学という学問は、物質世界を統制する科学技術の体系として重要であるにとどまらず、世界を認識するための体系として重要である。
english: The field of mechanics is important not only as a system of science and technology that controls the material world, but also as a system for understanding the world.

translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.
japanese: 彼女の講演はただ面白いだけにとどまらず、必ず深い哲学が含まれている。
reading: 彼女の講演はただ面白いだけにとどまらず、必ず深い哲学が含まれている。
english: Not only are her lectures interesting, they always have some deep philosophical meaning, too.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: ナポリで撮った両親の写真を見るにつけ、あの時の楽しかった旅行を思い出す。
reading: ナポリで撮った両親の写真を見るにつけ、あの時の楽しかった旅行を思い出す。
english: When I see the photo of my parents I took in Naples, I remember what a great time we had on that trip.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 新緑の香りを嗅ぐにつけ、「ああ、春なんだなあ」と思わずのほほんとしてしまいます。
reading: 新緑の香りを嗅ぐにつけ、「ああ、春なんだなあ」と思わずのほほんとしてしまいます。
english: As I smell the scent of fresh green foliage, I tell myself it's finally spring and feel really relaxed, almost without realizing it.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: そのピアニストの深みのある音楽を聴き、温かい人柄に触れるにつけ、「音楽は人なり」の思いを強くしております。
reading: そのピアニストの深みのある音楽を聴き、温かい人柄に触れるにつけ、「音楽は人なり」の思いを強くしております。
english: As I listen to the pianist's deeply-felt music and sense his warm personality, I feel strongly that music is man.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 深刻化する年金問題や経済問題に対する政府の無策ぶりを見るにつけ、自分のことは自分で守るしかないと思う。
reading: 深刻化する年金問題や経済問題に対する政府の無策ぶりを見るにつけ、自分のことは自分で守るしかないと思う。
english: As I watch the government's inability to deal with the increasingly serious problems related to the pension system and economy, I think that we must (do what we can to) protect ourselves.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 二十歳をはるかに過ぎても自立への見通しのつかない若者を見るにつけ、聞くにつけ、やるせない思いがあります。
reading: 二十歳をはるかに過ぎても自立への見通しのつかない若者を見るにつけ、聞くにつけ、やるせない思いがあります。
english: As I watch or hear about young people who are well over 20 but have no prospects for becoming independent, I feel heavy-hearted.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: いじめや虐待、陰惨な事件など、子供を取り巻く不幸な状況を考えるにつけ、この国の行く末を案じずにはいられない。
reading: いじめや虐待、陰惨な事件など、子供を取り巻く不幸な状況を考えるにつけ、この国の行く末を案じずにはいられない。
english: Whenever I think about the unhappy circumstances surrounding children, with the recent cases of bullying, abuse, and gruesome incidents, it makes me feel concerned about the future of this country.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 世界各地での戦いの様子を見るにつけ胸が痛む。
reading: 世界各地での戦いの様子を見るにつけ胸が痛む。
english: As I watch the wars going on in various places around the world, my heart aches.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 最近頻発している医療ミスの記事を読むにつけ、私も被害者になる可能性があったのではと戦慄を覚えてしまう。
reading: 最近頻発している医療ミスの記事を読むにつけ、私も被害者になる可能性があったのではと戦慄を覚えてしまう。
english: Whenever I read articles about all of the medical errors that have been happening (frequently) recently, I shudder at the thought that I could have been a victim.

translation: As; every time; whenever
explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.
japanese: 年末が一気に駆け足でやってくるのを感じるにつけ、自分の年齢を思い知らされます。
reading: 年末が一気に駆け足でやってくるのを感じるにつけ、自分の年齢を思い知らされます。
english: As I feel the end of the year coming at a dash, I become aware of my age.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: オリンピックが16日間にわたって開かれた。
reading: オリンピックが16日間にわたって開かれた。
english: The Olympic Games were held for sixteen days.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 干ばつのため広範囲にわたって作物が被害を受けた。
reading: 干ばつのため広範囲にわたって作物が被害を受けた。
english: Due to the drought, crops were damaged over a wide area.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 配管工事のため、明日午前１時から午前9時ごろにわたって断水する。
reading: 配管工事のため、明日午前１時から午前9時ごろにわたって断水する。
english: Due to work on the pipes, the water supply will be cut off from 1 a.m. to about 9 a.m. tomorrow.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: その記事は8回にわたって新聞に連載された。
reading: その記事は8回にわたって新聞に連載された。
english: The articles appeared serially in the newspaper over eight issues (literally: extending to eight times).

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 約40年にわたる冷戦がついに終わった。
reading: 約40年にわたる冷戦がついに終わった。
english: The Cold War, which lasted for about 40 years, ﬁnally came to an end.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: A社の携帯電話サービスで、関東の一部で昨夜午後9時ごろから約6時間にわたって接続障害があった。
reading: A社の携帯電話サービスで、関東の一部で昨夜午後9時ごろから約6時間にわたって接続障害があった。
english: Last night there was an interruption (literally: connection difficulties) in Company A's mobile phone service in a certain area of Kanto for about six hours starting about 9 o'clock.
extra_notes: さくや is the formal reading; ゆうべ is informal

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: コミック『ピーナッツ』は、１９５０年に誕生して以来半世紀以上にわたって世界中のファンを魅了してきた。
reading: コミック『ピーナッツ』は、１９５０年に誕生して以来半世紀以上にわたって世界中のファンを魅了してきた。
english: From the time of its debut in 1950, the cartoon "Peanuts" has fascinated fans all over the world for over half a century.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: その川の両側には２０エーカーにわたって森が広がっている。
reading: その川の両側には２０エーカーにわたって森が広がっている。
english: On both sides of the river, the forest stretches for 20 acres.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 厚い雨雲が関東から九州にわたって広がっている。
reading: 厚い雨雲が関東から九州にわたって広がっている。
english: Thick clouds extend from Kanto to Kyushu.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 昨年1年間に両者の間で5回にわたって賄賂の授受があったことが明らかになった。
reading: 昨年1年間に両者の間で5回にわたって賄賂の授受があったことが明らかになった。
english: It became evident that one party paid the other bribes ﬁve times during the past year.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 殺人現場は再三にわたって捜査が行われた。
reading: 殺人現場は再三にわたって捜査が行われた。
english: The murder site was searched many times.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 当社では、中古車の電気装置を点火装置やバッテリーを含む５項目にわたってチェックいたします。
reading: 当社では、中古車の電気装置を点火装置やバッテリーを含む５項目にわたってチェックいたします。
english: Our inspection of the electrical system in used cars covers ﬁve points, including the ignition system and the battery. (literally: Our Company checks ﬁve points of used cars' electric systems, including the ignition system and the battery.)

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 実験の前に詳細にわたって器具の使い方の指示があった。
reading: 実験の前に詳細にわたって器具の使い方の指示があった。
english: Before the experiment there were detailed instructions regarding how to use the instruments.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 今回の会議では、環境保護の多岐にわたる問題について、議論が交わされた。
reading: 今回の会議では、環境保護の多岐にわたる問題について、議論が交わされた。
english: At this conference many issues concerning environmental protection were discussed.

translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.
japanese: 生産段階から消費段階にわたる食品の安全性を確保することが急務だ。
reading: 生産段階から消費段階にわたる食品の安全性を確保することが急務だ。
english: Ensuring safety from the production stage through the consumption stage is an urgent matter.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: その温泉は旅行雑誌によると神経痛にいいそうだ。
reading: その温泉は旅行雑誌によると神経痛にいいそうだ。
english: One of the travel magazines said that hot springs are good for nerve pain.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 日本の法律によるとおおむね12歳未満の者は逮捕の対象にならない。
reading: 日本の法律によるとおおむね12歳未満の者は逮捕の対象にならない。
english: According to Japanese law, generally, youths under 12 are not subject to arrest.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 聞いたところによると来年は授業料が上がるらしい。
reading: 聞いたところによると来年は授業料が上がるらしい。
english: Based on what I heard, (it appears that) tuition will go up next year.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 新聞の世論調査によると、内閣支持率は22%にまで急落したそうだ。
reading: 新聞の世論調査によると、内閣支持率は22%にまで急落したそうだ。
english: According to a newspaper poll, the approval rating for the Cabinet dropped sharply to 22 percent.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 友達に聞いたところによると、フィンランドのメーデーは学生も集まって春を祝う祭りの日だそうだ。
reading: 友達に聞いたところによると、フィンランドのメーデーは学生も集まって春を<ruby title="祝(いわ)"><rb>祝</rb><rt>いわ</rt></ruby>う祭りの日だそうだ。
english: According to my friend, May Day in Finland is a day when everyone, including students, joins in a festival to celebrate spring.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: H博士によると、犬は人間が歩く際に発する弱い電磁波を感じ取っている可能性があるという。
reading: H博士によると、犬は人間が歩く際に発する弱い電磁波を感じ取っている可能性があるという。
english: According to Dr. H, dogs may be able to feel the faint electromagnetic waves that people generate when they walk.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 政府筋によると、政府はバイオテロリズムへの対策を研究する審議会を設置する予定であるという。
reading: 政府筋によると、政府はバイオテロリズムへの対策を研究する審議会を設置する予定であるという。
english: According to government sources, the government plans to establish a panel that will study measures to cope with bioterrorism.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 法律によると、介護保険は適切な医療および福祉サービスが受けられるようにすることを目的としています。
reading: 法律によると、介護保険は適切な医療および福祉サービスが受けられるようにすることを目的としています。
english: According to the law, the purpose of insurance for care of the elderly is to make appropriate medical and welfare services accessible.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 辞書によると、「さびしい」には「寂しい」と「淋しい」の二つの漢字が使われている。
reading: 辞書によると、「さびしい」には「寂しい」と「淋しい」の二つの漢字が使われている。
english: According to the dictionary, two characters are used for sabishii, "寂", "淋".

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 調査によると、高齢者に対する暴力と虐待の加害者は、家族、友人あるいは知人であることが最も多い。
reading: 調査によると、高齢者に対する暴力と虐待の加害者は、家族、友人あるいは知人であることが最も多い。
english: According to the survey, those who inﬂict violence and abuse upon the elderly are most often the victim's family, friends or acquaintances.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 懲戒処分基準によると、教職員が酒酔い運転で死亡・重傷事故を起こした場合は免職になる。
reading: 懲戒処分[ちょうかいしょぶん]基準によると、教職員が酒酔い運転で死亡・重傷事故を起こした場合は免職になる。
english: According to the standards for disciplinary action, if a faculty or staff member driving under the inﬂuence (of alcohol) causes an accident resulting in serious injury or death, he or she will be dismissed.

translation: According to; based on
explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.
japanese: 韓国人の友人によると、中国では韓国語学習者が増えているらしい。
reading: 韓国人の友人によると、中国では韓国語学習者が増えているらしい。
english: According to my Korean friend, the number of the learners of Korean is increasing.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: リストラによらず(に)この会社を救う方法はない。
reading: リストラによらず(に)この会社を救う方法はない。
english: There is no way to save this company without restructuring it.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: この会社では学歴によらず、実力があればどんどん大きい仕事をまかされる。
reading: この会社では学歴によらず、実力があればどんどん大きい仕事をまかされる。
english: At this company, if you are capable, you will be given big assignments one after another, regardless of your educational qualiﬁcations.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 何事によらず困ったことがあったらいつでも相談して下さい。
reading: 何事によらず困ったことがあったらいつでも相談して下さい。
english: Whatever it may be, if you have trouble, please consult me anytime.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 国産(である)か輸入(である)かによらず牛肉は食べないことにしている。
reading: 国産(である)か輸入(である)かによらず牛肉は食べないことにしている。
english: (Regardless of) Whether it is domestically produced or imported, as a rule I do not eat beef.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: この会社は経験のあるなしによらず面接してくれる。
reading: この会社は経験のあるなしによらず面接してくれる。
english: This company will interview you regardless of your experience (literally: whether or not you have experience.)

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 天候のいかんによらず試合は予定通り行われます。
reading: 天候のいかんによらず試合は予定通り行われます。
english: No matter what the weather (literally: whatever the weather is like), the game will be held as scheduled.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 誰がそのプロジェクトを担当するかによらず担当者には特別手当が支給される。
reading: 誰がそのプロジェクトを担当するかによらず担当者には特別手当が支給される。
english: Regardless of who it is (literally: who takes the project), the project manager will be given special compensation.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 理想は武力によらず紛争を解決することだ。
reading: 理想は武力によらず紛争を解決することだ。
english: The ideal is to resolve disputes without using armed force.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 吉川さんは勤務先の斡旋によらず別の会社に再就職した。
reading: 吉川さんは勤務先の斡旋によらず別の会社に再就職した。
english: Mr. Yoshikawa was employed by another company without his former employer's help (literally: good ofﬁces).

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 本契約が両者の合意によらずに変更されることはない。
reading: 本契約が両者の合意によらずに変更されることはない。
english: This contract may not be altered without the agreement of both parties.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 当ダンス教室は、いつからでも始められ、経験によらずどなたでもご参加いただけます。
reading: 当ダンス教室は、いつからでも始められ、経験によらずどなたでもご参加いただけます。
english: In this dance studio, students can begin at any time and anyone, regardless of experience, can join.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 当社のセールスマンの給与は勤務年数や年齢によらず、常に販売実績を基に決定される。
reading: 当社のセールスマンの給与は勤務年数や年齢によらず、常に販売実績を基に決定される。
english: The salaries of this company's sales representatives are not dependent on their length of employment or age; they are always based on sales performance.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: QRの長さはPの位置によらず常に一定である。
reading: QRの長さはPの位置によらず常に一定である。
english: The distance between Q and R is always the same, regardless of where P is.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: この標準テストは在籍する大学や学部によらず、また大学生であるか社会人であるかによらず、誰でも受けられます。
reading: この標準テストは在籍する大学や学部によらず、また大学生であるか社会人であるかによらず、誰でも受けられます。
english: Anyone can take this standardized test, regardless of what university or school you attend or whether you are a university student or a professional.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: どんな仕事によらず、いつも誠実に務めなければいけない
reading: どんな仕事によらず、いつも誠実に務めなければいけない。
english: No matter what job you have, you should always do the work sincerely.

translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.
japanese: 持ち物が多いか少ないかによらず、きちんと整理ができている部屋は気持ちいい。
reading: 持ち物が多いか少ないかによらず、きちんと整理ができている部屋は気持ちいい。
english: Whether you own a few things or many, a well-organized space makes you feel good.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 我が社は日本国内のみならず、アメリカやヨーロッパなどでもビジネス活動を行っております。
reading: 我が社は日本国内のみならず、アメリカやヨーロッパなどでもビジネス活動を行っております。
english: Our company does business not only in Japan but also in America, Europe, and elsewhere.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: これからの企業は単に利益を追求するのみならず、環境に配慮した生産活動を行わなければならない。
reading: これからの企業は単に利益を追求するのみならず、環境に配慮した生産活動を行わなければならない。
english: Today's companies should not just pursue profits; they should also consider environmental protection issues in their production activities. (literally: they must perform production activities that take the environment into consideration as well.)

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 彼のしたことは人間として恥ずべきことである。のみならず、それは明らかに犯罪行為だ。
reading: 彼のしたことは人間として恥ずべきことである。のみならず、それは明らかに犯罪行為だ。
english: As a human being, he should be ashamed of what he did. Not only that, it is clearly a criminal act.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 料金体系のみならず、サービス体制も改善する必要がある。
reading: 料金体系のみならず、サービス体制も改善する必要がある。
english: It is necessary to change not only the fee structure but the service system as well.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 大統領の決定には国内のみならず、海外からも強い批判の声が上がっている。
reading: 大統領の決定には国内のみならず、海外からも強い批判の声が上がっている。
english: The president's decision is being criticized heavily not only within the country but also abroad.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: この会社は炭酸飲料メーカーとして世界的に有名であるのみならず、アメリカ合衆国を象徴する存在の一つでさえある。
reading: この会社は炭酸飲料メーカーとして世界的に有名であるのみならず、アメリカ合衆国を象徴する存在の一つでさえある。
english: Not only is this company famous worldwide as a carbonated beverage manufacturer, it is even an American symbol (literally: one of the entities that symbolize the United States).

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: この種の犯罪は、老後の生活資金を根こそぎ奪うなど、市民への経済的な影響が甚大であるのみならず、精神的打撃も多大である。
reading: この種の犯罪は、老後の生活資金を根こそぎ奪うなど、市民への経済的な影響が甚大であるのみならず、精神的打撃も多大である。
english: Crimes of this kind have an enormous impact on citizens, not only economically but also psychologically, as they can completely deprive citizens of their post-retirement livelihoods (among other things).

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 技術者は単に技術の進歩の推進者であるのみならず、人類・社会に及ぼす技術の影響についても強い責任感を持つ自律的な行動者であるべきである。
reading: 技術者は単に技術の進歩の推進者であるのみならず、人類・社会に及ぼす技術の影響についても強い責任感を持つ自律的な行動者であるべきである。
english: Technology specialists should not simply play a role as promoters of technological advancement; they should also be independent actors who bear a heavy (literally: strong) sense of responsibility for the effect of technology on people and on society.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 不正軽油の製造・販売・使用は、極めて悪質な脱税行為である。のみならず、ディーゼル車の排気ガスは大気中の有害物質を増加させるなど、環境汚染の原因にもなっている。
reading: 不正軽油の製造・販売・使用は、極めて悪質な脱税行為である。のみならず、ディーゼル車の排気ガスは大気中の有害物質を増加させるなど、環境汚染の原因にもなっている。
english: The production, the sale, and the use of illegal diesel oil are extremely serious acts of tax evasion. Not only that, these acts result in environmental pollution because they bring about an increase in toxic substances in the atmosphere via the exhaust from diesel cars.

translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.
japanese: 私はすっかり疲れていた。肩や頸の凝るのはもちろん、不眠症もかなり甚しかった。のみならず偶々眠ったと思うと、いろいろの夢を見勝ちだった。(芥川龍之介『夢』)
reading: 私はすっかり疲れていた。肩や頸の凝るのはもちろん、不眠症もかなり甚しかった。のみならず偶々眠ったと思うと、いろいろの夢を見勝ちだった。(芥川龍之介『夢』)
english: I was totally exhausted. My shoulders and neck were stiff, of course, and I was suffering from severe insomnia. Not only that, when I did finally fall asleep, I had many dreams. (From Dreams by Akutagawa Ryunosuke)

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 甘いのなんのって私は一口食べて全部残してしまいました。
reading: 甘いのなんのって私は一口食べて全部残してしまいました。
english: It was so sweet that I ate one bite and left the rest.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 飲んだのなんのって彼らは5本の酒を全部空けてしまった。
reading: 飲んだのなんのって彼らは5本の酒を全部空けてしまった。
english: They drank so much; they completely emptied ﬁve bottles of sake.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: かゆいのなんのって一晩中寝られなかった。
reading: かゆいのなんのって一晩中寝られなかった。
english: It was so itchy that I couldn't sleep all night.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 重いのなんのって二人でも持ち上がりませんでした。
reading: 重いのなんのって二人でも持ち上がりませんでした。
english: It was so heavy that even two people couldn't lift it.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 海の醍醐味を味わうなら、ホエールウォッチングだ。実際に見るクジラは、大きいのなんのって、すごい迫力だよ。
reading: 海の醍醐味を味わうなら、ホエールウォッチングだ。実際に見るクジラは、大きいのなんのって、すごい迫力だよ。
english: If you want to experience the true charm of the ocean, try whale watching. When seen in real life, whales are so huge they take your breath away.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: もう少しで釣れたのに糸が切れて魚は海の中。結構大きかったので悔しかったのなんのって！
reading: もう少しで釣れたのに糸が切れて魚は海の中。結構大きかったので悔しかったのなんのって！
english: I almost had it, but the line broke and the ﬁsh went back into the sea. It was really big, so I was so disappointed!

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: A:試合はどうだった？ B:いやもう、ひどいのなんのって、話したくもないよ。
reading:
A:試合はどうだった？ 
B:いやもう、ひどいのなんのって、話したくもないよ。
english:
A: How was the game? 
B: Oh, no, it was so terrible! I don't even want to talk about it.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 不便なのなんのって一番近くのスーパーに行くのに1時間もかかるんです。
reading: 不便なのなんのって一番近くのスーパーに行くのに1時間もかかるんです。
english: It's so inconvenient; it takes up to an hour to get to the nearest supermarket.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 朝日岳の山々はちょうど見事に色づいていてきれいなのなんのって。思わず時間を忘れて、しばらく見入ってしまいました。
reading: 朝日岳の山々はちょうど見事に色づいていてきれいなのなんのって。思わず時間を忘れて、しばらく見入ってしまいました。
english: The Asahidake Mountains had just turned colours and were so beautiful. Without realizing it, I stared at them for a while, completely forgetting the time.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: 驚いたのなんのって、しばらくは言葉も出なかった。
reading: 驚いたのなんのって、しばらくは言葉も出なかった。
english: I was so surprised that I couldn't even speak for a while.

translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent
japanese: この望遠鏡、よく見えるのなんのって土星の輪まではっきり見えたよ。
reading: この望遠鏡、よく見えるのなんのって土星の輪まではっきり見えたよ。
english: I could see so well with this telescope; I could even see Saturn's rings clearly.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 私は彼の常識の無さにあきれている。
reading: 私は彼の常識の無さにあきれている。
english: I am appalled by his lack of common sense.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 跳びたいと思っても跳べない。体力、筋力の無さを痛感しました。
reading: 跳びたいと思っても跳べない。体力、筋力の無さを痛感しました。
english: I wanted to jump, but I couldn't. I became painfully aware of my lack of physical and muscular strength.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 今回の一連の貴社の対応は、私たちには全く納得できるものではなく、貴社の誠意の無さに大変な憤りを感じます。
reading: 今回の一連の貴社の対応は、私たちには全く納得できるものではなく、貴社の誠意の無さに大変な憤りを感じます。
english: We cannot accept your company's response to this situation, and we are ﬁlled with anger at your company's lack of sincerity.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 辞書の使用を許可してもらったものの、時間不足で思ったように答えられない問題があり、自分の英語力の無さに落ち込みました。
reading: 辞書の使用を許可してもらったものの、時間不足で思ったように答えられない問題があり、自分の英語力の無さに落ち込みました。
english: Although I was allowed to use a dictionary, because of the time constraint there were parts I couldn't answer, and I felt depressed about my lack of English proﬁciency.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 親しみやすさと、温かさと、飾り気の無さが、さやの絶対的な魅力である。
reading: 親しみやすさと、温かさと、飾り気の無さが、さやの絶対的な魅力である。
english: Friendliness, warmth and a lack of affectation are what makes Saya so absolutely charming.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 最近の映画やドラマは、その内容の無さにがっかりさせられる。
reading: 最近の映画やドラマは、その内容の無さにがっかりさせられる。
english: I am disappointed with recent movies and dramas because of their lack of content.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: 調査によると日本の子供の自信の無さは世界一だそうである。
reading: 調査によると日本の子供の自信の無さは世界一だそうである。
english: According to a survey, Japanese children are the least self-conﬁdent in the world.

translation: Lack of; absence of
explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.
japanese: このマンガは設定は面白かったが、物語が進むにつれて話が大きくなり、リアリティの無さについていけなくなってしまった。
reading: このマンガは設定は面白かったが、物語が進むにつれて話が大きくなり、リアリティの無さについていけなくなってしまった。
english: This comic had an interesting plot, but as the story went on, it became so exaggerated that I couldn't take the lack of reality.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: やったのやらなかったのといつまで言っていても仕方がない。
reading: やったのやらなかったのといつまで言っていても仕方がない。
english: It is no use talking endlessly about what you did or didn't do.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: いつまでも好きだの嫌いだのと言っていないで、早く結婚相手を決めなさい。
reading: いつまでも好きだの嫌いだのと言っていないで、早く結婚相手を決めなさい。
english: You should decide who you want to marry soon without saying all the time that you like (this one) or that you don't like (that one).

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 彼女はアパートの部屋が狭いの場所が不便だのと文句ばかり言っている。
reading: 彼女はアパートの部屋が狭いの場所が不便だのと文句ばかり言っている。
english: She is always complaining about how small her apartment is, how inconvenient the location is, or whatever.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 彼女は一緒に行くの行かぬのといつまでも煮え切らない。
reading: 彼女は一緒に行くの行かぬのといつまでも煮え切らない。
english: She can never decide whether she is going with me or not.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 彼らは、誰がそのことをしゃべったのしゃべらなかったのと言い争っている。
reading: 彼らは、誰がそのことをしゃべったのしゃべらなかったのと言い争っている。
english: They are arguing over who leaked or didn't leak that information.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 条件がいいの悪いのといつまで言っていても仕方がない。
reading: 条件がいいの悪いのといつまで言っていても仕方がない。
english: There's no point in discussing endlessly whether conditions are good or bad.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 彼女はやっと就職できたのに、やれ場所が遠いの給料が悪いのと文句ばかり言っている。
reading: 彼女はやっと就職できたのに、やれ場所が遠いの給料が悪いのと文句ばかり言っている。
english: She ﬁnally found a job, but now she can't stop complaining about how far it is, how low the salary is, and so on and so on.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: コーチにフォームが悪いの力が入りすぎているのとさんざん直された。
reading: コーチにフォームが悪いの力が入りすぎているのとさんざん直された。
english: My coach kept correcting me, saying that my form was bad, I used too much force, and so on.

translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.
japanese: 真理は婚約者の給料が安いの背が低いのと勝手なことを言っている。
reading: 真理は婚約者の給料が安いの背が低いのと勝手なことを言っている。
english: Mari is saying selfish things such as how low her fiancé's salary is, how short he is, etc.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 教授の言わんとすることが学生に伝わらないのは、たいてい教授の方が悪いのだ。
reading: 教授の言わんとすることが学生に伝わらないのは、たいてい教授の方が悪いのだ。
english: It is usually a professor who is to blame when his students don't comprehend what he tries to convey.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 太陽はまさに山の稜線に沈まんとしていた。
reading: 太陽はまさに山の稜線に沈まんとしていた。
english: The sun was about to sink behind the mountain ridge.
extra_notes: まさに here = right then; just then; at that moment OR just (about to); on the verge (of doing or happening).

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: あの政治家は言わんとしているところがよく分からない。
reading: あの政治家は言わんとしているところがよく分からない。
english: I don't comprehend what that politician is trying to say.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 善意で何事かを行わんとすると、必ずそれに水を差す人間がいる。
reading: 善意で何事かを行わんとすると、必ずそれに水を差す人間がいる。
english: Whenever someone tries to do something with good intentions, inevitably there is someone who discourages it.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 専門家でない者を排除せんとする科学者の過剰防衛には辟易させられる。
reading: 専門家でない者を排除せんとする科学者の過剰防衛には辟易させられる。
english: I am fed up with overprotective scientists (literally: the overprotection of scientists) who try to eliminate non specialists.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 死なんとする者は本音を吐くものだ。
reading: 死なんとする者は本音を吐くものだ。
english: A person who is about to die gives vent to his true feelings.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 暴風のために木々が倒れんとしている。
reading: 暴風のために木々が倒れんとしている。
english: The trees are about to be blown over by the violent wind.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: まさに輝かんとする月が雲で隠れた。
reading: まさに輝かんとする月が雲で隠れた。
english: The moon, which was just about to shine, was concealed by the clouds.

translation: Try to do; be about to
explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.
japanese: 今にも崩れんとする天守閣には、城と命運をともにする城主の姿があった。
reading: 今にも崩れんとする天守閣には、城と命運をともにする城主の姿があった。
english: At the castle tower, which was on the verge of collapse, stood the castle lord, ready to share its fate.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 東京を中心に大雨が降った。
reading: 東京を中心に大雨が降った。
english: There was heavy rain, mostly in and around Tokyo.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 東南アジアを中心に鳥インフルエンザが急速に広がっている。
reading: 東南アジアを中心に鳥インフルエンザが急速に広がっている。
english: Bird ﬂu is spreading rapidly, primarily in Southeast Asia.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: この研究は中島教授を中心に進められている。
reading: この研究は中島教授を中心に進められている。
english: This research is progressing, with Professor Nakajima taking the lead.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 最近は小説よりもビジネス書を中心に読んでいる。
reading: 最近は小説よりもビジネス書を中心に読んでいる。
english: These days I mainly read business books, rather than novels.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: ファーストフードのR社は近々神戸を中心に新たに25店舗を開く予定だ。
reading: ファーストフードのR社は近々神戸を中心に新たに25店舗を開く予定だ。
english: Company R, a fast food company, plans to open 25 new stores in Kobe and neighbouring cities before long.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 現在、文部科学省を中心に、義務教育改革に向けた検討が進められている。
reading: 現在、文部科学省を中心に、義務教育改革に向けた検討が進められている。
english: The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology is taking the lead in investigating compulsory education reform.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 最近の調査で、アメリカでのオンラインビデオの視聴が若い層を中心に伸びていることが分かった。
reading: 最近の調査で、アメリカでのオンラインビデオの視聴が若い層を中心に伸びていることが分かった。
english: It has become clear from a recent survey that the viewing of online videos is increasing in America- most notably among young people.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: コンピュータメーカーのP社はデスクトップモデルを中心に２０％以上の大幅値下げを行うと発表した。
reading: コンピュータメーカーのP社はデスクトップモデルを中心に２０％以上の大幅値下げを行うと発表した。
english: The computer manufacturer P announced that it would give a large price reduction of 20 percent or more for their computers, with desktop models as the primary target.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: このサイトは熊本のニュースを中心に、温泉やグルメ、イベント情報などもご紹介します。
reading: このサイトは熊本のニュースを中心に、温泉やグルメ、イベント情報などもご紹介します。
english: This website highlights Kumamoto news as well as information on hot springs, gourmet foods, events, etc.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: 本プロジェクトでは、言語による情報伝達と、韻律や動作、表情など、言語以外の要素との関係を中心に研究を行った。
reading: 本プロジェクトでは、言語による情報伝達と、韻律や動作、表情など、言語以外の要素との関係を中心に研究を行った。
english: In this project we examined primarily the interrelationship between language-based communication and non-linguistic factors, such as meter, motions, facial expressions, etc.

translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.
japanese: この展示会はある著名な日本の建築家の作品を中心に、東京に建てられたモダンな建築について紹介している。
reading: この展示会はある著名な日本の建築家の作品を中心に、東京に建てられたモダンな建築について紹介している。
english: This exhibition, focusing mainly on works by an eminent Japanese architect, introduces modern architecture in Tokyo.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 今、現地の代理人を介して製造元と価格の交渉をしている。
reading: 今、現地の代理人を介して製造元と価格の交渉をしている。
english: We are negotiating the price with the manufacturer through a local agent now.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: インターネットを介して音楽や映画を配信できるようになった。
reading: インターネットを介して音楽や映画を配信できるようになった。
english: Music and movies can be distributed via the Internet now.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 我々はボランティア活動を介して地域の交流を図ろうとしている。
reading: 我々はボランティア活動を介して地域の交流を図ろうとしている。
english: We are trying to promote interaction among the local (units) through volunteer activities.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 通訳を｛介しての/介した｝商談は効率が悪い。
reading: 通訳を｛介しての/介した｝商談は効率が悪い。
english: Business talks via an interpreter are inefficient.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 日本にいる友達を介してこの情報を手に入れた。
reading: 日本にいる友達を介してこの情報を手に入れた。
english: I got this information with the help of (literally: through) a friend of mine in Japan.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: このウイルスはそれに感染した鳥から蚊を介して人に感染する。人から人や人から蚊を介しての感染はない。
reading: このウイルスはそれに感染した鳥から蚊を介して人に感染する。人から人や人から蚊を介しての感染はない。
english: This virus is transmitted to people from infected birds via mosquitoes. It is not transmitted between people either directly or via mosquitoes.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 自殺系サイトを介して知り合った男女が、初対面でいきなり一緒に自殺するという事件が続き、社会問題となった。
reading: 自殺系サイトを介して知り合った男女が、初対面でいきなり一緒に自殺するという事件が続き、社会問題となった。
english: There have been several incidents in which a man and a woman who had met through a suicide website committed suicide together right after meeting in person for the first time, and such incidents have become a social problem.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: このテロ組織は海外の金融機関を介して資金の調達と仕送りをしているらしい。
reading: このテロ組織は海外の金融機関を介して資金の調達と仕送りをしているらしい。
english: This terrorist organization seems to be collecting and distributing money via overseas ﬁnancial institutions.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 記憶は再生時に脳の「海馬」という部分を介して再構成される。
reading: 記憶は再生時に脳の「海馬」という部分を介して再構成される。
english: When we recall memories, they are reconstructed through the part of the brain called the hippocampus.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: 新しいビジネスを生むためのアイデアは、勤務外のインフォーマルなコミュニケーションを介して、より多く得られると言われる。
reading: 新しいビジネスを生むためのアイデアは、勤務外のインフォーマルなコミュニケーションを介して、より多く得られると言われる。
english: It is said that more ideas for creating new business can be obtained via informal communication outside of work.

translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.
japanese: このグループは、同じような障害で悩んでいる人々が、お互いの交流を介して問題をよりよく理解し、助け合っていけるよう、様々な支援を行っている。
reading: このグループは、同じような障害で悩んでいる人々が、お互いの交流を介して問題をよりよく理解し、助け合っていけるよう、様々な支援を行っている。
english: This group provides various kinds of support so that people with the same sort of disorder or disability can better understand others' problems and help each other by interacting.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: このような無責任な行いに対して怒りを禁じ得ない。
reading: このような無責任な行いに対して怒りを禁じ得ない。
english: I cannot hold back my anger at such an irresponsible deed.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: その感動的な光景を見て、涙がこみ上げてくるのを禁じ得なかった。
reading: その感動的な光景を見て、涙がこみ上げてくるのを禁じ得なかった。
english: Seeing the moving scene, I could not keep my tears from welling up.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: 24年の苦悩と空白の後、ついに実現した家族との再会に、周囲の者も涙を禁じ得なかった。
reading: 24年の苦悩と空白の後、ついに実現した家族との再会に、周囲の者も涙を禁じ得なかった。
english: (Seeing) the family reunited, an occasion that finally became reality after twenty-four years of agony and separation, people around them couldn't help but cry, too.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: その美しい早春の風景画に作者の温かい郷土愛を感じ、深い感動を禁じ得なかった。
reading: その美しい早春の風景画に作者の温かい郷土愛を感じ、深い感動を禁じ得なかった。
english: Looking at the beautiful early spring landscape painting, I felt the painter's love for his homeland, and couldn't help but be moved profoundly.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: 出版社による無神経な個人写真の扱い方に、驚きと憤りを禁じ得ない。
reading: 出版社による無神経な個人写真の扱い方に、驚きと憤りを禁じ得ない。
english: I can't hold back my surprise and anger at the publisher's thoughtless way of treating those personal photos.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: 大統領の声明は、せっかく第一歩を踏み出した両国の平和統一の働きに水を差すのではないかという疑問を禁じ得ない。
reading: 大統領の声明は、せっかく第一歩を踏み出した両国の平和統一の働きに水を差すのではないかという疑問を禁じ得ない。
english: I cannot keep myself from wondering if the president's announcement will pour cold water on the two nations' hard-won first step toward peaceful uniﬁcation.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: 長い間憧れていた人に会う瞬間が近づいて、次第に動悸が速まるのを禁じ得なかった。
reading: 長い間憧れていた人に会う瞬間が近づいて、次第に動悸が速まるのを禁じ得なかった。
english: As the moment approached when I was to meet with the person I'd admired for a long time, I could not stop my heart from beating faster and faster.

translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.
japanese: この業界の救いようのない保守性に、深いため息が出るのを禁じ得なかった。
reading: この業界の救いようのない保守性に、深いため息が出るのを禁じ得なかった。
english: (Looking at) this industry's hopeless conservatism, I couldn't help but let out a deep sigh.

translation: Centering around; in connection with; over; concerning; regarding; with regard to
explanation: A compound particle meaning “concerning; over”, which is used with an issue over which different opinions, ideas, etc., are expressed or exchanged.
japanese: モノレール建設をめぐって市民の意見が対立している。
